lines.text: [David is in a clothing shop buying clothes for Jody]
Why, David, I thought I'd never find you in ladies' underwear.
"Why do you think you're such a smoky somethin' when you're nothin' painted blue?"
I feel so shiny good about you - about everything! Like, wonderful!
I see your problem, David. And I hate to mention this, but... I'm dyin' in a rush!
